text: The Permanent Representative of Greece to the United Nations () is the Permanent Representative of the Greek government to the Headquarters of the United Nations in New York City. {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Diplomatic accreditation ! Permanent Representative ! Greek language ! Prime Minister of Greece !
